```{r loading gender data into r}
library(curl)
f <- curl("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dantos17/AN597-Notes/master/Gender.txt")
d <- read.table(f, header = TRUE, sep = "\t", stringsAsFactors = FALSE)
head(d)
#I GOT ITTTTTTTTT
```
